Coverage.definition: protection or indemnification by an insurance policy [the policy provides extensive against burglary] 2

1.definition: protection or indemnification by an insurance policy [the policy provides extensive against burglary]

2.definition: a risk assumed by the terms of an insurance contract [the policy lists four: liability, medical payments, uninsured motorists, and physical damage]
2.s: : liability, medical payments, uninsured motorists, and physical damage]
